text: Michael George Sadek (May 30, 1946 – January 20, 2021) was a Major League Baseball catcher. He spent his entire major league career with the San Francisco Giants. His career lasted from 1975 to 1981. Sadek died on January 20, 2021 in San Andreas, California from heart and lung disease, aged 74.Popular Giants catcher Mike Sadek, known as the ‘Sheik,’ dies at 74 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis Category:Deaths from lung disease
title: Mike Sadek
